description: This file contains test functions for an agent-based system that interacts with various language models (Claude, Gemini, OpenAI) to generate and parse information about national parks, specifically testing the parsing and response handling capabilities.

classes.name: ParkGuide
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing a guide for a national park, including its name, activities, and best season to visit.

methods.name: test_claude_with_openai_parser_model
methods.description: Test function for an agent using Claude as the main model and OpenAIChat as the parser model.

methods.name: test_openai_with_claude_parser_model
methods.description: Test function for an agent using OpenAIChat as the main model and Claude as the parser model.

methods.name: test_gemini_with_openai_parser_model
methods.description: Test function for an agent using Gemini as the main model and OpenAIChat as the parser model.

methods.name: test_parser_model_stream
methods.description: Test function for streaming responses from an agent using OpenAIChat as the main model and Claude as the parser model.
